parseLogs Class Reference

Detailed Description

This class parses Apache log files and turns the information into an array with the following keys ip access_time page type success_code bytes referer browser uniqueID

The latter key, 'uniqueID' is particularly important as it does not come from the log file itself but is, instead, a hash of the record. This can be used to delineate one record from the next
